name: Pashupatinath Temple
description: Sacred Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva located in Kathmandu.

name: Swyambhunath Stupa
description: One of the largest stupas in the world and a major center of Tibetan Buddhism.

name: Boudhanath Stupa
description: Ancient religious complex also known as the Monkey Temple, situated on a hilltop in Kathmandu.
